note.p: Only child of Edward Sneyd of Byrkley Hall, Needwood, Staffordshire, and his wife Maria Greaves. Lived in Dartmouth Row, Blackheath, Kent, 1851.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/891/16/8)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1995 (Ancestry.com, accessed 18 February 2021)
will of Maria Sneyd (The National Archives PROB 11/2077/78)
